function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of infectious diseases through wildlife trafficking and deforestation","Impact":"Increased risk of epidemics and pandemics in human populations","Mitigation":"Enforcement of regulations against wildlife trafficking and deforestation, and monitoring of wet markets","Technologies":"Tracking and surveillance technologies, environmental monitoring tools","People":"General population, wildlife conservation organizations","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Overexploitation of nature and neglect of environmental protection","Impact":"Threat to human safety from future disease outbreaks and environmental degradation","Mitigation":"Implementation of sustainable environmental policies, reforestation efforts, and wildlife protection measures","Technologies":"Sustainable agriculture practices, environmental monitoring technologies","People":"Environmental activists, policymakers, general population","Owner":"Government agencies, environmental organizations"},{"Description":"Unsustainable business practices leading to environmental harm","Impact":"Threat to global environment and public health","Mitigation":"Adoption of sustainable business models, investment in clean energy, and promotion of eco-friendly infrastructure","Technologies":"Renewable energy technologies, green building materials, sustainability assessment tools","People":"Business leaders, policymakers, environmental activists","Owner":"Businesses, government agencies, environmental organizations"}]}
